name: Independent Studies
description: A research/writing project designed by the student in consultation with a faculty member. Independent Study students will produce a substantial body of writing at a high professional standard submitted in weekly installments and will develop their drafts in editing sessions with other Independent Studies students. Students will also design and carry out a reading program. The Project Supervisor will be chosen in consultation with the Program Coordinator. Students may not take WRI390H5 and WRI391H5 in the same term.
prerequisites: 8.0 credits including 3.0 WRI credits with a mark of 77% or higher in each and permission of Program Coordinator. Check web for application details.ÿWeb:www.utm.utoronto.ca/pwc
